body_html:
Apologies, I skipped the template format while raising the issue.

Environment info

Operating System: Ubuntu 14.04 on both machines (Machine 1 and 2)

Installed version of CUDA and cuDNN:
(please attach the output of ls -l /path/to/cuda/lib/libcud*):

Machine 1 (for my experiment) with worker task_index=0 :

-rwxrwxrwx 1 root root   322936 Aug 15  2015 /home/username/../../usr/local/cuda-7.5/targets/x86_64-linux/lib/libcudadevrt.a
lrwxrwxrwx 1 root root       16 Aug 15  2015 /home/username/../../usr/local/cuda-7.5/targets/x86_64-linux/lib/libcudart.so -> libcudart.so.7.5
lrwxrwxrwx 1 root root       19 Aug 15  2015 /home/username/../../usr/local/cuda-7.5/targets/x86_64-linux/lib/libcudart.so.7.5 -> libcudart.so.7.5.18
-rwxrwxrwx 1 root root   383336 Aug 15  2015 /home/username/../../usr/local/cuda-7.5/targets/x86_64-linux/lib/libcudart.so.7.5.18
-rwxrwxrwx 1 root root   720192 Aug 15  2015 /home/username/../../usr/local/cuda-7.5/targets/x86_64-linux/lib/libcudart_static.a
-rwxr-xr-x 1 root root 60696704 Aug 18 08:01 /home/username/../../usr/local/cuda-7.5/targets/x86_64-linux/lib/libcudnn.so
-rwxr-xr-x 1 root root 60696704 Aug 18 08:01 /home/username/../../usr/local/cuda-7.5/targets/x86_64-linux/lib/libcudnn.so.5
-rwxr-xr-x 1 root root 60696704 Aug 18 08:01 /home/username/../../usr/local/cuda-7.5/targets/x86_64-linux/lib/libcudnn.so.5.1.3
-rw-r--r-- 1 root root 59715990 Aug 18 08:01 /home/username/../../usr/local/cuda-7.5/targets/x86_64-linux/lib/libcudnn_static.a

Machine 2 (for my experiment) with ps task_index=0 and worker task_index=1 :

-rw-r--r-- 1 root root   322936 Aug 15  2015 /home/username/../../usr/local/cuda-7.5/targets/x86_64-linux/lib/libcudadevrt.a
lrwxrwxrwx 1 root root       16 Aug 15  2015 /home/username/../../usr/local/cuda-7.5/targets/x86_64-linux/lib/libcudart.so -> libcudart.so.7.5
lrwxrwxrwx 1 root root       19 Aug 15  2015 /home/username/../../usr/local/cuda-7.5/targets/x86_64-linux/lib/libcudart.so.7.5 -> libcudart.so.7.5.18
-rwxr-xr-x 1 root root   383336 Aug 15  2015 /home/username/../../usr/local/cuda-7.5/targets/x86_64-linux/lib/libcudart.so.7.5.18
-rw-r--r-- 1 root root   720192 Aug 15  2015 /home/username/../../usr/local/cuda-7.5/targets/x86_64-linux/lib/libcudart_static.a
lrwxrwxrwx 1 root root       13 Aug 22 17:36 /home/username/../../usr/local/cuda-7.5/targets/x86_64-linux/lib/libcudnn.so -> libcudnn.so.5
lrwxrwxrwx 1 root root       17 Aug 22 17:36 /home/username/../../usr/local/cuda-7.5/targets/x86_64-linux/lib/libcudnn.so.5 -> libcudnn.so.5.0.5
-rwxr-xr-x 1 root root 59909104 Aug 22 17:36 /home/username/../../usr/local/cuda-7.5/targets/x86_64-linux/lib/libcudnn.so.5.0.5
-rw-r--r-- 1 root root 58775484 Aug 22 17:36 /home/username/../../usr/local/cuda-7.5/targets/x86_64-linux/lib/libcudnn_static.a

  1. Which pip package you installed.
  2. The output from python -c "import tensorflow; print(tensorflow.__version__)".

### Environment info
